text: [Music]
education is an education technology
company and our goal is to transform the
way students learn we look to inspire
engage and drive impact for learners on
a global scale leveraging the latest
technology powered by ai to truly drive
personalization and real-time
interventions in a primary and holistic
way we want to make digital education
more inclusive and cater for solutions
that work for varying needs and learner
profiles our flagship product the elf
platform is an ai driven platform that
creates personalized learning
experiences for students that has also
been instrumental in helping students
achieve better learning outcomes equally
important it has also been beneficial
for educators by freeing up valuable
time spent on non-teaching tasks they
can now use this time to focus on
mentoring and coaching their students a
student who struggles with certain
concepts can choose to stay on a
particular track where they're having
difficulties while the same time the
teacher because of the feedback can
decide on a more appropriate
intervention strategy an advanced
learner on the other hand can pursue
more challenges compared with
conventional classroom where different
students are lumped together and go
through the same track the situation
that limits the learning experience in
many ways at the core of any ai approach
is data and we collect over 100 million
data points per day and these take
points are collected from how students
and teachers use our platforms this
drives a range of different services and
approaches from automated assessments
and grading which reduces the teacher
workload targeted support through
personalization and allows students to
learn at their own pace real-time
dashboards on student progress and
understanding the mastery of each
student allows teachers to target their
time more effectively exam predictions
coupled with mastery allows educators to
understand where the gaps are and this
allows for more of a targeted approach
we have experienced significant cost
reductions in terms of our i.t spend by
working with aws
such as 50 savings on our cloud data
warehouse cost which we use to support
our
analytics service we also improved our
video streams by 300 by providing
teaching students use the platform to
have uninterrupted access to videos our
production environments have 99.99
uptime which is exceptionally important
for us
for the overall user experience
for our users and and ensures our kid
that we have a continued success for our
alif for our platforms and ensuring we
provide a very stable platform our lift
education is able to deliver its
platform anywhere in the world through
using aws data centers and cloudfront to
deliver both the platform and content
this ensures the alif education is
positioned to grow and scale and is open
to opportunities from across the globe
using cloud services from aws for the
entire infrastructure has truly helped
us lower our costs maximize our
resources and have enabled us to provide
a better user experiences for our
customers at scale so the ala platform
is now in use by more than 120 000
students in the uae u.s and indonesia
will be launching it to more than a half
a million students we have a strategic

using aws and its wide range of
